ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0101_0701_01_10:
Huh? Ah! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Glad to see you looking chipper!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0101_0701_02_10:
Shall we head out on an adventure? With you, I
feel like anything’s possible!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0601_0701_01_10:
As the Tower Tycoon, I’ve battled against my fair
share of challengers.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0601_0701_03_10:
And so my battles with them really set my soul
on fire!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0602_0701_01_10:
It’s hard to contain my excitement when I’m faced
with a strong opponent!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0602_0701_02_10:
You might find it childish, but there’s really nothing
I can do about it.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0602_0701_03_10:
I mean... Isn’t this what it means to be a Pokémon
Trainer, after all?
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0603_0701_01_10:
A bit of advice: take care to fully appreciate each
moment as you live it.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0603_0701_02_10:
Just as there are some things that are only
apparent to adults, there are others that only
children see clearly.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0603_0701_03_10:
And the feelings you experience as a child will be
your treasures for the rest of your life!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0604_0701_01_10:
It seems my son Barry is working hard on Pasio
just like you are.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0604_0701_02_10: I hope that someday he’ll grow up to surpass me.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0604_0701_03_10:
There are certainly plenty of excellent Trainers
around here for him to learn from!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0605_0701_01_10:
There are endless possibilities open to people
and Pokémon!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0605_0701_02_10:
The potential to become stronger lies hidden
within each and every one of us.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0605_0701_03_10:
As long as we’re able to truly connect with
our partners, that is.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0605_0701_04_10:
I know that’s not a problem for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/0605_0701_05_10:
I’m sure nothing’s going to get in your way as you
continue moving forward!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/1701_0701_01_10:
There’s something I’ve been meaning to give you.
Here, please take it.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/1701_0701_02_10: I think it should help you on your adventures!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/1701_0702_01_10:
If I find anything else that seems useful, I’ll be
sure to give it to you!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0701_01_10:
I have these words of wisdom for any young
Trainers who defeat me when I’m battling
in earnest:
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0701_02_10:
You can be all that you desire! There’s no limit to
where you can go!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0701_03_10:
Just between you and me, I was hoping to say
those words to Barry.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0701_04_10:
But now I’m thinking up something else to say to
him. Don’t tell him, OK?
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0702_01_10:
All children are destined to eventually surpass
us adults.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0702_02_10:
You and Barry are both sure to surpass me as you
become adults yourselves.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2501_0702_03_10:
Please keep on going even further, and reach
new heights!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0701_01_10:
Many fantastic Trainers from all over the world
are gathered here on Pasio.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0701_02_10:
Battling with those sync pairs will be excellent
fuel for your training.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0701_03_10:
You’ll grow and mature through your bonds with
your Pokémon and your battles with Trainers...
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0701_04_10:
and one day, I hope you’ll show me how far
you’ve come!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0702_01_10:
The strength of a Trainer is the greatest proof of
their hard work together with their Pokémon.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/2511_0702_02_10:
That doesn’t mean I’m criticizing weakness, though.
And I’m sure that you’re capable of attaining
true strength.
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/3001_0701_01_10:
When I see the sun rise in the morning, it makes
me want to go out and explore! How about you?
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m looking forward to being challenged by strong
sync pairs!
ch0134_00_kurotsugu/3005_0701_01_10: It’s getting late. Why don’t we call it a day?
